name: Ch.10ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Natasha;Yes, I am Natasha.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Amelia;Yes, my name is Amelia.|Princess Eirika informed me that you're from Grado, too!
speak;Natasha;Oh!|You're from Grado too?!|Oh, how wonderful it is, to have another woman from Grado here!
speak;Amelia;Yay!|Everyone here has been so kind so far, but it's nice to have someone from home!|What part of Grado are you from?
speak;Natasha;I'm from Serafew, actually!|Although, I've served as a cleric in the Imperial Temple for the longest time...
speak;Amelia;Wow, you worked up there?...|No wonder you have such pretty robes!|Every time I've dropped by, I've always been helped by clerics like you!|So I've gotta thank you, really!
speak;Natasha;Oh! You're quite welcome, Amelia!|We worked so hard there to help the people...|...Before...
speak;Natasha;...Never you mind.|Your gratitude is appreciated, regardless!
speak;Amelia;Oh!|I just had a wonderful idea!|Why don't I cook us up a Grado dinner?|A little taste of home!
speak;Natasha;Goodness, are you certain?|It's awfully kind of you, but I feel as though I should handle it...

speak;Amelia;Well, I'm from up in the mountains! I can surprise you!|And I think you deserve to be treated, for being so nice!|...Though, it'd be lovely to cook with you...|So, hey, let's do it! Yeah!
speak;Natasha;He he! You're far too kind, Amelia. It would be lovely indeed...
